pages.text: The $(thing)Serenade for Syrinx$() will enchant a regular $(l:instruments/flute)Flute$() with melodic energy, turning it into $(item)Pan's Flute$().$(br2)Not only can Pan's Flute release much more $(l:basics/music)Melody$() than a regular Flute, but $(emph)Animals$() and $(emph)Villagers$() will also be unable to resist its melody and will follow you when you play it.
